org.wattdepot.server

Class WattDepotServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wattdepot.server.WattDepotServer

  • public class WattDepotServer
extends Object
    WattDepotServer - The main class that starts up the WattDepotServer coordinates the different interfaces.
    Author:
    Cam Moore
